label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed a bug where deleted resources triggered the deletion of TXT records, potentially impacting deletions but not additions when upgrading from any version prior to v0.12.0. If issues occur, the records may need to be manually recreated or downgraded.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added the shareProcessNamespace field to the deployment.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support to specify the target as NodeExternalIP or via annotation.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for Gateway API Route Sources.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed the Helm chart installation command line.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Restricted the RFC2136 Kerberos password from being exposed in logs.
